resources.string: Please enter the email address associated with your account. We\'ll send you a verification code to reset your password.
Your new password must be different from your previous password.
You\'ve successfully created a new password and taken another step in reuniting hearts. Now, you can go to the login screen to access your account.
Your information has been successfully submitted;We don\'t find any match we will store you report so the right one can found you.
